balanceOf(address).details: Returns the balance in Grg Tokens of the `staker`

balanceOfGrgVault().details: Returns the entire balance of Grg tokens in the vault.

params.grgProxyAddress: Address of the RigoBlock Grg Proxy.
params.newOwner: Address of the Grg vault owner.

depositFrom(address,uint256).details: Deposit an `amount` of Grg Tokens from `staker` into the vault. Note that only the Staking contract can call this. Note that this can only be called when *not* in Catastrophic Failure mode.

enterCatastrophicFailure().details: Vault enters into Catastrophic Failure Mode. *** WARNING - ONCE IN CATOSTROPHIC FAILURE MODE, YOU CAN NEVER GO BACK! *** Note that only the contract owner can call this function.

params.index: Index of target in authorities array.

setGrgProxy(address).details: Sets the Grg proxy. Note that only an authorized address can call this function. Note that this can only be called when *not* in Catastrophic Failure mode.

params.grgProxyAddress: Address of the RigoBlock Grg Proxy.

setStakingProxy(address).details: Sets the address of the StakingProxy contract. Note that only the contract owner can call this function.

transferOwnership(address).details: Change the owner of this contract.

withdrawAllFrom(address).details: Withdraw ALL Grg Tokens to `staker` from the vault. Note that this can only be called when *in* Catastrophic Failure mode.

withdrawFrom(address,uint256).details: Withdraw an `amount` of Grg Tokens to `staker` from the vault. Note that only the Staking contract can call this. Note that this can only be called when *not* in Catastrophic Failure mode.

Deposit(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when Grg Tokens are deposited into the vault.

GrgProxySet(address).notice: Emitted whenever the Grg AssetProxy is set.

InCatastrophicFailureMode(address).notice: Emitted when the Staking contract is put into Catastrophic Failure Mode

StakingProxySet(address).notice: Emmitted whenever a StakingProxy is set in a vault.

Withdraw(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when Grg Tokens are withdrawn from the vault.
